name: planted.duck
description: Sweet-savory Hoisin notes with five-spice aromas and caramel roasting flavors.
longDescription: Experience the flavors of Asia with our planted.duck Asian Style. Featuring sweet-savory Hoisin notes, subtle five-spice aromas, and delicious caramel roasting flavors, it's incredibly juicy and tender. Perfect for wok dishes, bao buns, or Asian-inspired bowls.
ingredients: Water, pea protein, rapeseed oil, Hoisin sauce, five-spice blend, soy sauce, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Stir-fry in a hot wok for 4-5 minutes. Serve in bao buns, over noodles, or in an Asian-style bowl with fresh vegetables.
